AvenueQ:
The sun is shining, it's a lovely day,
太阳在照呀今天真好呀	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
A perfect morning for a kid to play,
一个完美的早晨来玩耍	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -5 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
But you're got lots of bills to pay
可账单要还的还多	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
What can you do?
你能做什么	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Your work real hard and the pay's real low
你工作太辛苦工资又太少	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And every hour goes oh, so slow
而每一小时都太慢	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And at the end of the day there's no where to go
在一天结束时没有地方可去到	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Back home to Avenue Q
回到了昆特大道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
YouAreNotAlone:
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
你有没有感到没人陪伴你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
你是否曾被遗忘在无名之地的荒野	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt like you could disappear
你是否曾有过想要消失的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Like you could fall and no one would hear
就像无人知晓你坠落	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
那寂寞的感觉就洗掉吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
也许有一个理由相信你会没事的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -5 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
当你不坚强时你会倒下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You can reach, reach out your hand
你可以伸手去拿	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Even when the dark comes crashing through
即使黑暗冲破了夜空	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When you need a friend to carry you
当你需要朋友来陪伴	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And when you're broken on the ground
当你跌倒在地里时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You will be found
你会被发现	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

So let the sun come streaming in
就让阳光照进来吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
因为你会奋起再重生	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Lift your head and look around
抬起头看看四周	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You will be found
你会被发现	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -5 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
OnlyUs:
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
我不需要你给我理由去想要你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
我不需要你找证据我该有的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You don't have to convince me
你不用再说服我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
你不必害怕你不够格	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
'Cause what we've got going is good
因为我们有进展了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
我不需要更多关于破碎的提醒	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
我不需要你修复我宁愿忘记	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Clear the slate and start over
清空白板重来吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Try to quiet the noises in your head
试着安静那些杂念吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We can't compete with all that
我们无法竞争它	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

So what if it's us?
管他我们俩	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
What if it's us And only us
要是只有我们两个	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
而那些过往不再重要也不算数	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Can we try that?
能试一下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

What if it's you
要是你呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if it's me
要是是我呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if that's all that we need it to be
要是这就是我们所需要的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And the rest of the world falls away?
世界就只剩下你我了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What do you say?
你觉得呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
我从没想过会有人像你那样想要我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
所以我给你一万个理由不让我走	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But if you really see me
但若你真的看见我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
If you like me for me and nothing else
如果你爱我而不是别的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
好吧这就是我所渴望的比你可能知道的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -4 len_constraint: 16 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
IMissTheMountains:
All these blank and tranquil years
空白而安详的年	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Seems they've dried up all my tears
好像把我泪都干	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And while she runs free and fast
她自由自在奔跑	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Seems my wild days are past
似乎往事如烟	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)

But I miss the mountains
却想念那山川	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the dizzy heights
怀念头晕目眩	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the manic magic days
那些狂热的时光	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And the dark depressing nights
以及阴郁的夜晚	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

I miss the mountains
想念那山峦	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the highs and lows
想念高低起伏	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the climbing all the falling
所有攀登所有坠落	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
All the while the wild wind blows
狂风呼啸着吹过	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Stinging you with snow
雪花刺伤你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And soaking you with rain
淋湿你一身雨	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the mountains
想念那山峦	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the pain
想念痛苦	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
YouDontKnow:
Do you wake up in the morning
你是否在清晨醒来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And need help to lift your head
需要帮忙抬起头	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Do you read obituaries
你是否看过讣告	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And feel jealous of the dead
羡慕那些已故者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It's like living on a cliffside
就像住在悬崖边上	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Not knowing when you'll dive
不知何时潜入	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Do you know, Do you know
你可知可不知	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
What it's like to die alive
死亡的感觉如何	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

When a world that once had color
曾经有颜色的世界	(rhyme type: 3 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Fades to white and grey and black
渐渐变成白色灰色	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When tomorrow terrifies you
当明天让你惊慌失措	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But you'll die if you look back
回头望就死定了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

You don't know
你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know you don't know
我知道你不懂	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -4 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You say that you're hurting
你说你在受伤	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It sure doesn't show
毫无征兆	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You don't know
你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It lays me so low
它让我沮丧	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When you say let go
当你说放手	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And I say You don't know
我说妳不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Popular:
Whenever I see someone less fortunate than I
每当我看到比我更不幸的人时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And let's face it
面对现实	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Who isn't less fortunate than I?
谁不比我更不幸呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
My tender heart tends to start to bleed
脆弱的心开始流血了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

And when someone needs a makeover
当有人需要改头换面	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I simply have to take over!
我就必须要接管了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know, I know exactly what they need!
我知道我完全了解他们的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -5 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

And even in your case
就连你这样的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -4 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Though it's the toughest case I've yet to face
虽然这是最艰难的案例	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Don't worry, I'm determined to succeed!
别担心我决心要成功啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Follow my lead
跟随我吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

you will be Popular!
你会大红大紫	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You're gonna be popular!
你将会很受欢迎	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I'll teach you the proper poise
我教你正确姿势	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When you talk to boys
和男生说话	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Little ways to flirt and flounce
小小的撩人方式	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

I'll show you what shoes to wear!
我会告诉你穿啥	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
How to fix your hair!
怎么梳头发	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Everything that really counts to be...
一切那些真正重要的事	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
POPULAR!
流行啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I'll help you be popular!
我帮你红遍天下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

You'll hang with the right cohorts
你会结交到朋友	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You'll be good at sports
会成为好手	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Know the slang you've got to know
学会地道的俚语	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
So let's start
那就走	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
'Cause you've got an awfully long way to go!
因为你还有很长的路要走	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Don't be offended by my frank analysis
不要被我直白的分析冒犯了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Think of it as personality dialysis
把它当作人格上的洗礼吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -5 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Now that I've chosen to become a Pal, a sis or an advisor
我选择成为朋友姐妹或老师时就会有收获	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 17 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
There's nobody wiser!
世上没人比得上	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Not when it comes to POPULAR!
但当说到热门时呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know about popular
我知道关于流行	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -5 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And with an assist from me
还得我帮忙配合	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
To be who you'll be
成为你自己	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Instead of dreary who you were...
不要怀念过去的你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
There's nothing that can stop you From becoming popu-ler...
没有什么能阻止你成为超级热门的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
RevoltingChildren:
Never again will she get the best of me,
她再也轮不到她占上风了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again will she take away my freedom,
她再也不会剥夺我的自由了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And we won't forget the day we fought for the right to be a little bit naughty.
而我们不会忘记争取过一点小小的自由的日子	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 20 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again, will the chokey door slam.
再不会被关在牢房里了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again, will I be bullied and
再也不会让人欺负我了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
当我妈妈说我是奇迹时我再也不会怀疑了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 18 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again will we live behind doors
我们不再被关在门后了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

We are revolting children, living in revolting times
我们是叛逆的孩子生活在叛逆时代	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -3 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
我们唱着反歌唱着反调的诗	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done,
我们会反抗到反抗结束为止	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
我们要驱逐特兰奇布尔起义	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Six:
He got down on one knee but I said no way
他跪地求情但我说不可能	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Packed my bags and moved into a nu nu nunneray
我打包好东西搬到了另一个地方	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Joined the gospel choir, our riffs were on fire
加入福音合唱团我们飙唱	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -5 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
At the top of the charts is where I'm gonna stay
我将留在排行榜的顶峰之上	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -9 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Henry sent me a poem all about my green sleeves
贺郎寄我一首诗说绿衣青袖都写我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -5 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I changed a couple words put it on a sick beat
我换了几个词放上节奏感强	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -5 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
The song blew their minds, next minute I was signed
歌一出下个瞬间签约了我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And now I'm writing lyrics for Shakesy P
而现在我为沙奎斯写歌词了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Since my first son, our family's grown
自从有了第一个儿子	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We made a band and got quite well known
我们组建乐队很出名	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You could perhaps call us the Tudor Von Trapps
或许你可以叫我们都铎家	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I'm just kidding, we're called the Royalling Stones
我只是开玩笑我们叫皇家	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -4 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

We're one of a kind no category
我们是独一无二的无类	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -4 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Too many years lost in his story
太多年被他故事吞噬	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We're free to take, our crowning glory
我们可以自由地拿它	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -5 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
For five more minutes
再过五分钟吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We're Six
我们是	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 2 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

What a shame yeah my face it cost me the crown
真可惜我脸皮花了王冠啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
So I moved to the Haus of Holbein in my hometown
所以我搬进故乡的霍尔贝因之家	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
His mates were super arty, but I showed them how to party
他的伙伴非常艺术但我们知道怎么玩	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -4 len_constraint: 16 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Now on my tour of Prussia everybody gets down
普鲁士之行每个人都要趴下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

Music man tried it on and I was like bye
音乐人试穿了它而我如是	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 1 reward3: 2)
So I thought "Who needs him?", I can give it a try
想他多无趣不如自己尝试	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I learned everything, Now all I do is sing
我学了所有现在我只会唱	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -5 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And I'll do that until I die
我会做下去直到死	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

Heard all about these rockin' chicks
听说这些摇滚女孩	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Loved every song and each remix
爱每首歌每混音版	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
So I went out and found them, And we lay down an album
我出去找他们合了一张专辑下来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -7 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Now I don't need your love, all I need is Six
不再需要你的爱只要六块	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
WavingThroughAWindow:
Step out, step out of the sun
走出走出阳光下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
If you keep getting burned
不断被烧伤的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Step out, step out of the sun
走出走出阳光下	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Because you've learned, because you've learned
因为你学了因为你学了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -2 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)

On the outside always looking in
